description: Surrogate unique identifier for the status change entry.
Date and time the status change event was logged.
User or system account that performed the change.
Business identifier of the purchase order whose status changed.
Snapshot reference to the purchase order master used at change time; likely a denormalized lookup—confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the purchase order’s description captured at the time of change; confirm with SME.
Code representing the resulting purchase order status after the change.
Snapshot reference to the resulting status in the status dictionary at change time; confirm with SME.
Text label for the resulting status captured at the time of change.
Code representing the prior purchase order status before the change.
Snapshot reference to the prior status in the status dictionary at change time; confirm with SME.
Text label for the prior status captured at the time of change.
Timestamp when this log entry was last updated by any process.
Timestamp when a user last updated this entry (vs. automated process); likely date-time—confirm with SME.
User account that created this log entry.
Timestamp when this log entry was created.
User account that most recently updated this entry.
Timestamp of the most recent user-driven update to this entry.
